<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="cmn_map_page"><cmn_map_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><center_address>St. Cloud, Fl</center_address><center_latitude>28.2489016</center_latitude><center_longitude>-81.2811801</center_longitude><controls_size>large</controls_size><coordinates_retrieved_on/><disable_map_controls/><disable_nav_bar>false</disable_nav_bar><filter/><initial_zoom>14</initial_zoom><name>x_407566_adventu_0_Student Pickup</name><overview>false</overview><refresh_on_zoom>false</refresh_on_zoom><roles/><script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("x_407566_adventu_0_school");
gr.addQuery('active', 'true');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
    if (gr.location.latitude && gr.location.longitude) {
        var item = map.addItem(gr);
        item.latitude = String(gr.location.latitude);
        item.longitude = String(gr.location.longitude);
        item.dialog_title = gr.getDisplayValue();
        item.icon = gr.logo;
        item.icon_width = "42";
        item.icon_height = "42";
    }
}
var pgr = new GlideRecord("x_407566_adventu_0_student");
pgr.addQuery('active', 'true');
pgr.addActiveQuery();
pgr.query();
while (pgr.next()) {
    if (pgr.parent.location.latitude && pgr.location.longitude) {
        var pitem = map.addItem(pgr);
        pitem.latitude = String(pgr.parent.location.latitude);
        pitem.longitude = String(pgr.parent.location.longitude);
        pitem.dialog_title = pgr.getDisplayValue();
        pitem.icon = pgr.photo;
        pitem.icon_width = "42";
        pitem.icon_height = "42";
    }
}]]></script><show_device_location>true</show_device_location><suffix>Student Pickup</suffix><sys_class_name>cmn_map_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-24 02:13:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>295a0acb475261104a908a5f746d43c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_407566_adventu_0_Student Pickup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Adventure Express" source="x_407566_adventu_0">e1d175fa470121104a908a5f746d4384</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Adventure Express">e1d175fa470121104a908a5f746d4384</sys_scope><sys_update_name>cmn_map_page_295a0acb475261104a908a5f746d43c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-24 02:13:26</sys_updated_on><type>satellite</type><type_selection>buttons</type_selection><use_advanced_configuration>false</use_advanced_configuration></cmn_map_page></record_update>
